titleStmt.title: A pil to purge melancholie: or, A preprative [sic] to a pvrgation: or, Topping, copping, and capping: take either or whether: or, Mash them, and squash them, and dash them, and diddle come derrie come daw them, all together..

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Carl H. Pforzheimer Library.
